description: http://anidb.net/ch81326 [Ami]`s stepbrother. Due to parental abandonment, he ends up developing romantic feelings for her stepsister which she also reciprocates. In http://anidb.net/a7817 [Tabidachi: Ami Shuushou], it is revealed that Ami is her first love, writing on a photograph of a young Ami "If Ami weren`t my sister..."
name: Nonomura Hiroshi
